game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure buried deep within the mysterious island.
game.reward: A chest filled with gold coins and precious gems

task.objective: Obtain a map to the treasure
task.description: Visit the old lighthouse and search for clues that will lead you to the map.
Use the map to navigate through the dense jungle and find the entrance to the hidden cave.
Inside the cave lies an ancient riddle. Solve it to open the door to the treasure chamber.
Once the chamber is open, collect the treasure and bring it back to Captain Morgan.
